name: Lights Out (itch) (LightsOutGame)
description:
Story

You play as Charlotte, an excursionist that gets lost in her way after falling off the path, she now has to find her way back to her excursion by traversing a dangerous path through an abandoned forest and house where she finds many secrets.

Controls

"WASD" to move, "SpaceBar" to activate flahlight, "E" to interact.

Features

Order puzzles for level progression.

Enemies patrolling the map.

A flashlight to light up the path.
